pages.title: Blue Whale
pages.text: The blue whale ($(o)Balaenoptera musculus$()) is a marine mammal and a baleen whale.$(br2)The blue whale's long and slender body can be of various shades of greyish-blue dorsally and somewhat lighter underneath.$(br2)There is also a population in the waters off Chile that may constitute a fifth subspecies.

pages.title: Blue Whale
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★★★$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 12 Days
